name: Comité de fabricants européens d'installation et de distribution de pétrole
goal:
CECOD is the Committee of European Manufacturers of Petroleum Measuring and Distributing Equipment, a non-profit association, providing facilities for its members to share technical information related to fuel measuring and dispensing technologies and processes.
CECOD members work closely with European Member States and Authorities in all relevant matters in support of its deep commitment to promote the unification of European Legal Metrology, Safety and Environmental legislation together with its subsequent enforcement.
interests: Competition, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Our association is interested in all directives involved in petrol measuring systems such as Machinery, ATEX, MID, LV, EMC, etc... as well as other specific directives such as VR2 (2014/99) and 1999/92/EC (ATEX for workplaces)
